feed.title: OneUptime Releases

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.2981
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.2986
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Add .africa TLD - PR: #1643 - refactor: Improve error message for no summary available in SummaryIn… - PR: #1644 - Refactor query typescript types - PR: #1645 - Incoming request heartbeat check - PR: #1646 - Make graphs beautiful - PR: #1647
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.2988
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- refactor: Add support for additional condition operators in IfElse co… - PR: #1648 - refactor: Update description for Input 2 in Condition component - PR: #1649
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.2994
